summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for reduction of the assessments on certain property levied for the improvement of Brandon Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 44720, creating Local Improvement District No. 3617, in full settlement for the taking of certain property for the widening of Brandon Street, and in payment of any and all claims of damages by reason of the grading of said street, and the making of necessary slopes.
